A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Everyone has already said it\, but this movie sucked. Way to kill a franchise! I don't know whether the fault lies with Rian Johnson or Disney\, but I'm going back to the expanded universe books and pretend this doesn't exist. If you want to see future Luke as he should have been\, read Dark Empire and others.\n\nThoroughly disappointed. Mark Hamill was right. Look up some of his thoughts on how they destroyed Luke's character. #notmyluke
